jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Responsible for preparation of annual budgeting, quarterly forecasting, and monthly management reporting process alongside with other department heads (Commercial, marketing, SCM and operation, human capital, and other supporting functions) 
● Create and refine reporting mechanisms to provide the right data and information related to company’s revenue, operational cost, and budget utilization 
● Monitor and control actual financial results 
● Responsible on preparing monthly variance analysis report to support management for decision making 
● Responsible to highlight key financial issues and deliver the proposed solutions to the stakeholders 
● Provide insightful financial analysis on regular and ad-hoc basis such as but not limited to topline daily/weekly tracker, business unit performance review, and other financial ratios analysis 
● Prepare financial feasibility review on the Company’s strategic business decisions followed by post-implementation review and provide suggestions to management 
● Lead the cost control team to ensure that the running cost is under control, properly monitored on timely basis, and to review the accuracy of third party vendors or business partners’ billings 
● Coordinate cost controlling efforts across the entire payments and commerce product groups and functions 
● Communicate to respective department head on the accountability of the departmental budget 
● Responsible for analyzing group expenses, strategizing cost saving initiatives, leading internal cost control teams, and executing cost control initiatives 
● Lead finance system implementation projects

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
